creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
markings: censor seals: 村田 {Murata}, 衣笠 {Kinugasa}, シタ賣 {shitauri}; publisher's seal: 徳、濱田屋 {Toku, Hamadaya}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
signed: in toshidama cartouche: 豊國画 {Toyokuni ga}
text: Related to the play Narukami 鳴神, performed at the Ichimura Theater, 1851, 5th month.
title: Actors Ichikawa Danjūrō VIII as Narukami Shōnin, Arashi Kichisaburō III as Hakuunbō, Ōtani Tomoemon IV as Kokuunbō, Ichikawa Kuzō II as Sekiunbō, Ichikawa Komazō VII as Seiunbō, Bandō Shuka I as Kumo no Taema
